query:
UPDATE texts
                    SET folder_id = NULL
                    WHERE folder_id = ? OR folder_id IN (
                        WITH RECURSIVE folder_tree AS (
                            SELECT id FROM folders WHERE parent_id = ?
                            UNION ALL
                            SELECT f.id FROM folders f
                            INNER JOIN folder_tree ft ON f.parent_id = ft.id
                        )
                        SELECT id FROM folder_tree
                    )
